Articles.Content: Does a moderator have to approve your post every time you post from a new IP? I posted from my new laptop, and the post has to be approved.
Nope. However, all posts in the Announcements forum are moderated, so that's probably why you came across that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Nope. However, all posts in the Announcements forum are moderated, so that's probably why you came across that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I was gonna say it... ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I didn't jump the gun, though.
